Title: GUR, MFA evacuate 179 people, incl 134 Ukrainians, from Lebanon
Description: The Main Intelligence Directorate of the Defense Ministry of Ukraine (GUR) and the Foreign Ministry of Ukraine successfully carried out another operation to evacuate citizens from Lebanon on October 1. As a result of the operation, 179 people were evacuated, the press service of GUR reported on Wednesday.

Title: Nova Poshta faces labor shortage due to workforce migration to co...
Description: Companies like Nova Poshta, Ukraine's largest logistics operator, which can only exempt 50% of their workforce from military service, are experiencing severe labor shortages as workers migrate to companies offering 100% exemption from conscription.

Title: Germany to send six large power generators to Ukraine
Umerov promises info on major missile program in coming months
Description: More information about Ukraine's major missile program will appear next year or by the end of this year, Ukrainian Defense Minister Rustem Umerov has said on Wednesday.

Title: Defense forces confirm withdrawal from Vuhledar
Description: The Khortytsia Operational and Strategic Group has confirmed that the high command granted permission to carry out a maneuver to withdraw units from Vuhledar in order to preserve personnel and military equipment, and to take a position for further actions.

Title: Occupiers mobilize more than 300,000 people in occupied areas of ...
Description: KYIV. Oct 2 (Interfax-Ukraine) – Russian occupiers mobilized more than 300,000 people in the occupied areas of Donetsk region from the beginning of Russia's full-scale invasion of Ukraine to the summer of 2024, according to a report by the non-governmental organizations Eastern Human Rights Group and Institute for Strategic Studies and Security, presented at a press conference hosted by the Interfax-Ukraine News Agency on Wednesday.

Title: No delays in work of defense industry despite attacks on energy s...
Description: Ukraine's defense industry is working on schedule despite Russia's attacks on the energy system, and there are no production delays, Adviser to the President of Ukraine on Strategic Issues Oleksandr Kamyshin has said on Wednesday.

Title: Zelenskyy meets with top management of world's top defense compan...
Description: President of Ukraine Volodymyr Zelenskyy held a meeting with the heads and top executives of defense companies from partner countries as part of the second International Defense Industries Forum (DFNC2), the presidential press service has said on Wednesday.

Title: Poroshenko works to shore up European support for Ukraine during ...
Russian likely seizes Vuhledar on Oct 1, unlikely to make rapid g...
Description: Russian forces likely seized Vuhledar, Donetsk region, as of October 1 following a reported Ukrainian withdrawal from the settlement, though it is unclear if Russian forces will make rapid gains beyond Vuhledar in the immediate future, the Institute for the Study of War (ISW) has said.

Title: Shmyhal: There should be no safe places in European part of Russi...
Description: There should not be a single safe place in the European part of Russia not reached by Ukrainian drones and missiles, Ukrainian Prime Minister Denys Shmyhal has said on Wednesday.

Title: Seven people, incl teenager, injured in enemy airstrike on Derhac...
Description: Law enforcers have documented the damage caused by an airstrike inflicted by the enemy on Derhachi, Kharkiv region, in the early hours of this morning.

Title: Rutte: Ukraine's affiliation with NATO will depend on how the war...
Description: Mark Rutte, who took office as NATO Secretary General, states: Ukraine's future membership in NATO is already spelled out in the Washington Declaration of the alliance summit, however, progress towards membership should be considered in the context of further developments.

Title: Zelenskyy awards 18 military with Hero of Ukraine title, 10 of th...
Description: President of Ukraine Volodymyr Zelenskyy has awarded the title of Heroes of Ukraine with the award of the Order of the Golden Star to 18 servicemen.

Title: Kernel announces plans to fully redeem $300 mln eurobonds in Oct
Description: Kernel agroholding announced its intention to fully redeem $300 million five-year eurobonds with a rate of 6.5% per annum on the scheduled maturity date of October 17, 2024 and pay a coupon on them, the company said in a statement on the Warsaw Stock Exchange on Tuesday.

Title: Kyiv working to accelerate partners’ decision on funds by using R...
Description: Ukraine continues to work on accelerating the partners' decision on the use of Russian assets to protect against Russian aggression, Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy said in an evening address on Tuesday, October 1.

Title: Estonia initiates change in structure of assistance to Ukraine, f...
Description: Estonia intends to change the structure of military assistance to Ukraine, focusing on the production of products needed by Ukraine at Estonian enterprises, Estonian Defense Minister Hanno Pevkur said.

Title: Poroshenko, candidate for European Commissioner on Security Kubil...
URCS volunteers helping victims of airstrikes on Zaporizhia
Description: Volunteers of the Ukrainian Red Cross Society (URCS) helped the victims of the Russian airstrike on Zaporizhia on Tuesday.

Title: Nova Poshta launches courier delivery, parcel pickup in Austria
Description: Nova Poshta, Ukraine’s largest logistics operator, has launched courier delivery in Austria.

Title: Memorial sculpture Heavenly Guard unveiled in Kyiv on Defenders' ...
Description: Kyiv Mayor Vitali Klitschko, together with the head of the State Border Guard Service of Ukraine Serhiy Deineka, opened a memorial sculpture 'Heavenly Guard' on the Day of Defenders of Ukraine in the new square of Heroes of the Border Guards in Darnytsky district of Kyiv.

Title: MFA denies reports that Sybiha in New York discussed possible ter...
Description: The Ministry of Foreign Affairs of Ukraine refutes reports in foreign media that Foreign Minister Andriy Sybiha discussed the possibility of territorial concessions from the Ukrainian side during his visit to New York.

Title: PACE urges to impose sanctions on propagandists, Russian state me...
Description: The Parliamentary Assembly of the Council of Europe (PACE) has called on its members to apply sanctions to Russian propagandists and state media of the Russian Federation, as well as to recognize the Russian Orthodox Church as an instrument of Russian influence and propaganda, said Yevhenia Kravchuk, a member of the permanent delegation of the Verkhovna Rada to PACE (the Servant of the People faction).

Title: Housing Institute prepares analysis of municipal housing
Description: The Housing Institute, which launched in this autumn, aims to focus on analytical work, with its first project being a study of municipal housing in pilot regions, according to Alina Moskalenko, the director of the institute, in an interview with Interfax-Ukraine.

Title: Shmyhal: Every second munition in combat zone is Ukrainian
Description: Prime Minister Denys Shmyhal says that the production of weapons in Ukraine has tripled in 2023, and today every second munition in the combat zone is Ukrainian-made.

Title: Withdrawal of troops for operations in Kursk region weakens Russi...
Description: The success of the Ukrainian forces, who managed to take control of the Volchansky chemical plant, which was used by the occupying army as a stronghold, is attributed in British intelligence to the withdrawal of Russian troops from this facility for operations in Kursk region.

Title: More than 7,000 lonely older people receive social care from Ukra...
Description: More than 7,000 lonely older people receive social care from the Ukrainian Red Cross Society (URCS).

Title: Zelenskyy allows active military to be employed in Veterans Minis...
Description: President of Ukraine Volodymyr Zelenskyy allowed, if necessary, to involve active military personnel in the Ministry of Veterans Affairs.

Title: Number of injured in Zaporizhia rises to 21 people, including 12-...
Description: The number of people injured in an enemy airstrike against Zaporizhia on Tuesday has risen to 21, including a 12-year-old child, Head of Zaporizhia Regional Military Administration Ivan Fedorov has said.

Title: Rutte: Situation on battlefield difficult, but Russia losses up t...
Description: New Secretary General of NATO Mark Rutte has said that the situation on the battlefield in Ukraine is not easy, but at the same time, Russia's limited gains on the battlefield this year cost it around 1,000 killed or wounded a day.

Title: Rutte: Ukraine has right to hit Russian territory, but it's up to...
Description: The new Secretary General of NATO, Mark Rutte, supports the position of his predecessor Jens Stoltenberg that Ukraine has the right to strike the legitimate military targets on the territory of Russia, however it is up to the country that supplies relevant weapons to decide on lifting restrictions on such strikes.

Title: Interfax-Ukraine to host press conference on results of public op...
Description: On Friday, October 4, at 10.30, the press center of the Interfax-Ukraine News Agency will host a press conference on the results of a public opinion monitoring on the subject: 'Ukrainians in Wartime: Pride, Remembrance, Victory.' The results of a representative survey of the population regarding the socio-political situation in Ukraine, which is conducted annually in monitoring mode by the Institute of Social and Political Psychology of the National Academy of Sciences of Ukraine in cooperation with the Association of Political Psychologists of Ukraine, will be presented. Monitoring allows tracking long-term trends and situational changes in public consciousness under the influence of the events of the Russian-Ukrainian war. Participants: President of the Association of Political Psychologists of Ukraine, Acting Deputy Director for Research of the Institute of Social and Political Psychology of the National Academy of Sciences of Ukraine, Doctor of Psychological Sciences Iryna Hubeladze, Deputy President of the Association of Political Psychologists of Ukraine, Deputy Director for Scientific and Methodological Work of the Institute of Social and Political Psychology of the National Academy of Sciences of Ukraine, Candidate of Psychological Sciences Svitlana Chunikhina (8/5a Reitarska Street). The event will be streamed on the YouTube channel of the Interfax-Ukraine agency. Admission requires registration on the spot with press ID cards.

Title: VITAGRO supplies first Ukrainian biomethane to Ukraine's GTS with...
Description: The VITAGRO Group of Companies with assets in the agricultural, energy, processing, construction and chemical industries, together with specialists from the Khmelnytsky branch of Gas Distribution Networks of Ukraine LLC, for the first time supplied biomethane to the Ukrainian gas transmission system (GTS), which will launch the export of Ukrainian biomethane, the group reported.

Title: NATO Secretary General Rutte: Ukraine's rightful place is in NATO
Description: New Secretary General of NATO Mark Rutte has said at the NATO Headquarters in Brussels on Tuesday that Ukraine's rightful place is in the alliance.

Title: Six civilians killed in enemy attack on Kherson center – PGO
Description: Six people were killed as a result of an enemy attack on the center of Kherson on Tuesday, the condition of another person, who was thought to be dead, has been stabilized, according to updated information from the Prosecutor General's Office of Ukraine (PGO).

Title: New NATO Secretary General Rutte: My first priority is Ukraine
Description: Mark Rutte, who has come into office of NATO Secretary General on Tuesday, said that Ukraine will be his top priority.

Title: One of two power lines to ZNPP de-energized once again due to att...
Description: As a result of a Russian attack on a main substation, one of the power lines supplying the occupied Zaporizhia NPP was de-energized.

Title: More than hundred civilians stay in Vuhledar amid hostilities in ...
Description: All children have already been evacuated from Vuhledar, Donetsk region, however 107 civilians are still staying in the city, while hostilities are already taking place in the city, Head of Donetsk Regional Military Administration Vadym Filashkin has said on Tuesday.

Title: Energoatom puts 1000 MW NPP unit into operation after repairs
Description: Energoatom connected a 1000 MW nuclear power unit to the Ukrainian power grid 12 days ahead of schedule, the company reported.

Title: Ukrainian Red Cross warns about appearance of organization's fake...
Description: The Ukrainian Red Cross has issued a warning about the appearance of a fake Telegram account of the organization.

Title: Death toll in attack on Kherson market rises to seven – prosecuto...
Description: Seven people were killed as a result of an enemy attack on the market in the center of Kherson, the regional prosecutor's office has said, adding that an investigation has been launched.

Title: Ukraine doesn't need our permission to strike back against Russia...
Description: Ukraine is a sovereign country and it does not need a permission from the United States to strike back against targets on the territory of Russia, Spokesperson for the U.S. Department of State Matthew Miller has said, adding that Ukraine can use weapons of its own production.

Title: Ukrainian Air Force units destroy 29 of 32 enemy drones last nigh...
Description: Ukrainian Air Force units shot down 29 of 32 enemy drones last night.

Title: General Staff reports destruction of enemy air defense, radar sys...
Description: During the past 24 hours, the Ukrainian missile and artillery forces hit one air defense system, a gun in a firing position, a personnel concentration area, a radar system, and another important military object of the Russian invaders, the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine (AFU) has reported on the Telegram channel as of 8 a.m. on Tuesday.

Title: Rada Committee Head Merezhko on by-elections to Czech Senate: mai...
Description: It is important for Ukraine that after the by-elections to the Senate of the Czech Republic, the parties supporting our country retained the parliamentary majority, Head of the Verkhovna Rada Committee on Foreign Policy and Interparliamentary Cooperation Oleksandr Merezhko (Servant of the People faction) said.

Title: EU, G7 need to make political commitment on $50 bln for Ukraine b...
Description: Italy, as the G7 presidency, is currently seeking a political commitment from the EU and G7 countries to participate in an initiative to provide Ukraine with $50 billion by the end of 2024 from revenues from frozen Russian assets around the end of October, European Commission Executive Vice-President Valdis Dombrovskis said.

Title: Poroshenko speaks at Political Assembly of European People's Part...
Description: Petro Poroshenko spoke at the Political Assembly of the European People's Party in Brussels, where the presentation of candidates for the positions of European Commissioners from the EPP took place, according to the website of European Solidarity.

Title: Ombudsman: Three children, their mother return from occupied terr...
Description: It was possible to return three minor children and their mother to the territory controlled by the Ukrainian government, Verkhovna Rada Commissioner for Human Rights Dmytro Lubinets said.

Title: Zelenskyy holds HQ meeting discussing staffing of brigades
Description: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy held a meeting of the Headquarters of the Supreme Commander-in-Chief on Monday.

Title: Zelenskyy: Preparing for Ramstein meeting, partners receive all d...
Description: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy held a meeting with the military, government and the Presidential Office following his visit to the United States, the Ukrainian side is preparing for a meeting in the Ramstein format.

Title: Zelenskyy: We preparing to sign another security agreement
Description: Ukraine is preparing to sign the 27th security agreement, President Volodymyr Zelenskyy said.

Title: Zelenskyy receives updates on all frontlines
Description: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy heard reports on Monday from Commander-in-Chief of the Armed Forces of Ukraine Oleksandr Syrsky and Chief of the General Staff Anatoliy Barhilevych.

Title: Hungary to continue to support Ukraine's energy sector – Szijjárt...
Description: Hungarian Minister of Foreign Affairs and Trade Peter Szijjártó, during talks with his Ukrainian counterpart Andriy Sybiha in Budapest, said Hungary will continue to support Ukraine's energy supply and will encourage its largest oil and gas company MOL and the power transmission system operator MAVIR to help develop Ukrainian energy.

Title: Zelenskyy's visit to USA shows support for Ukraine in world – Nal...
Description: The visit of President Volodymyr Zelenskyy to the United States, his participation in the UN General Assembly in New York showed serious support for Ukraine in the world, Secretary of the Verkhovna Rada Committee on the Integration of Ukraine into the European Union Valentyn Nalyvaichenko (Batkivschyna faction) said.

Title: Forced mobilization of workers in Russian-occupied territory of U...
Description: On Wednesday, October 2, at 12.00, the press center of the Interfax-Ukraine News Agency will host a press conference regarding the presentation of the analytical report entitled 'Forced mobilization of workers in Russian-occupied territory of Ukraine in 2022.'

Title: AFU General Staff: 14 enemy assaults recorded on Lyman axis, ten ...
Description: Eighty combat clashes were recorded along the entire front line since the beginning of the day as of 16:00 on Monday, including 14 enemy assaults on the Lyman axis, ten of which were repulsed and the rest are ongoing, the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine (AFU) has said.

Title: The most credible security guarantee for Ukraine is NATO's member...
Description: On the penultimate day as NATO Secretary General, Jens Stoltenberg gave a short interview to the Interfax-Ukraine news agency. Already on Tuesday, October 1, the official ceremony of handing over the powers to Mark Rutte, who was previously the Prime Minister of the Netherlands, will be held as the Secretary General of the Alliance.

Title: Norway cancels automatic protection for Ukrainian refugees from U...
Description: Norway canceled automatic protection for Ukrainian refugees from six regions of Ukraine from September 27, the Ministry of Reintegration of the Temporarily Occupied Territories said.

Title: Zaporizhiaoblenergo completes 91% of substation protection - comp...
Description: Distribution system operator OJSC Zaporizhiaoblenergo has completed 91% of work to strengthen high-voltage substations in the region and continues to do so, said company director Andriy Stasevsky.

Title: Stoltenberg: Putin's nuclear threats to NATO allies aimed at prev...
Description: NATO Secretary General Jens Stoltenberg has said in an exclusive interview with the Interfax-Ukraine News Agency that Vladimir Putin's recent threats on the review of the nuclear deterrence doctrine are just another attempt to threaten NATO allies and prevent them from supporting Ukraine.

Title: Stoltenberg: It's for NATO allies to decide whether Ukraine can b...
Description: NATO Secretary General Jens Stoltenberg has said in an exclusive interview with the Interfax-Ukraine News Agency that it is up to NATO allies to decide whether it is possible to invite Ukraine to the alliance in conditions where part of Ukrainian territory is still occupied by Russians.

Title: New major changes to 024 state budget unlikely – head of budget c...
Description: Roksolana Pidlasa, chair of the parliamentary budget committee, predicts that there will be no new cardinal changes to this year's budget after its spending on security and defense increased by almost UAH 500 billion in mid-September.

Title: Seizure of Arricano Group assets and accounts in Ukraine lifted
Description: Arricano Real Estate PLC (Cyprus), which owns four shopping centers in Ukraine (Kyiv, Zaporizhia, Kryvy Rih) through its Ukrainian subsidiaries, reports that Ukrainian courts have lifted all arrests previously imposed on the assets and accounts of the group's enterprises.

Title: Switzerland supports ‘peace initiative’ of China and Brazil on wa...
Description: Switzerland supports the 'peace initiative' of China and Brazil to resolve the war in Ukraine, despite the fact that it neither refers to the UN Charter, nor directly mentions the territorial integrity of Ukraine, Blick reports, referring to representative of the Swiss Foreign Ministry Nicolas Bideau.

Title: Ukrainian Red Cross informs Sumy residents of rules of handling w...
Description: Instructors of the Ukrainian Red Cross Society (URCS) inform residents of Sumy region about the rules of conduct during shelling and in case of detection of explosive objects.

Title: AFU General Staff confirms strike on Kotluban military arsenal wi...
Description: The Ukrainian Defense Forces have hit the Kotluban military arsenal in Volgograd region (Russia), the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine has confirmed.

Title: Zelenskyy on Putin's nuclear threats: I think he should be afraid...
Description: No one knows what is in Vladimir Putin's head, but he loves his life and should be afraid to use nuclear weapons, Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy believes.

Title: Epicenter opens shopping mall in Chabany near Kyiv
Description: On Saturday, Epicenter K LLC opened the first phase of a shopping mall in Chabany, near Kyiv (8 Odeska Highway), according to the company's press service.

Title: Sybiha-Szijjarto talks in the tete-a-tete format last about an ho...
Description: Negotiations between Minister of Foreign Affairs of Ukraine Andriy Sybiha and Minister of Foreign Economy and Foreign Affairs of Hungary Peter Szijjarto ended in a tete-a-tete format in Budapest.

Title: There will be no responsibility for obtaining Russian passport in...
Description: Citizens, who received a Russian passport under duress in the temporarily occupied territories, will not be held responsible for this, the Ministry of Justice of Ukraine says.

Title: Zelenskyy: At Ramstein, we must determine with other leaders how ...
Description: The Ukrainian side and partners have begun to prepare for a meeting in the Ramstein format, it is necessary to determine how to increase pressure on the Russian Federation, Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy said.

Title: Ukrainian Defense Forces eliminate 1,250 occupiers over day - Gen...
Description: The Ukrainian military destroyed 1,250 Russian invaders, five tanks, 27 armored vehicles, 27 artillery systems, one air defense system, 38 drones, 69 units of cars and special equipment, the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine reported enemy losses per day on Monday morning.

Title: Ukrnafta reports cases of fuel coupon forgery
Description: Recently, there have been cases of forged UKRNAFTA fuel coupons, according to a statement from PJSC Ukrnafta on its Facebook page.

Title: Invaders drop more than 100 smart bombs on Ukrainian territory ov...
Description: The Russian invaders carried out 70 airstrikes on the territory of Ukraine, dropping 110 guided bombs, the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine reported as of 22:00 on Sunday, September 20.

Title: Poroshenko at security conference in Sweden: West has means to de...
Description: The leader of the European Solidarity party, MP Petro Poroshenko, participating in the international security conference in Visby (Sweden), called on Western allies to ensure Ukraine's victory, and stressed that the West has all the capabilities and resources to ensure that Russia is defeated in Ukraine, the political force's website reported.

Title: URCS participates in rescue operations in Sumy region
Description: The Ukrainian Red Cross Society (URCS) rapid response team is working at the site of the Russian airstrike on the hospital in Sumy.

Title: Zelenskyy's Peace Formula for most world leaders is the main docu...
Description: Head of the President’s Office, Andriy Yermak, stressed the importance of the visit of Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy to the United States, during which more than 30 meetings were held on the sidelines of the UN General Assembly with world leaders, both partner countries that support the Ukrainian Peace Formula, but also countries that take a 'neutral position.'

Title: Biden says that ‘Ukraine will win this war’
Description: U.S. President Joe Biden has again expressed confidence that Ukraine will prevail in resisting Russian aggression, and assured that the United States would provide Kyiv with the necessary support.

Title: URCS volunteers help victims of Zaporizhia air strikes
Description: The Zaporizhia rapid response unit of the Ukrainian Red Cross Society (URCs) is working at the site of buildings destroyed as a result of the Russian airstrike in Zaporizhia.

Title: Nizhankovychi-Malhowice border crossing with Poland to temporaril...
Description: Ukraine's State Border Guard Service announced that starting September 30, the Nizhankovychi-Malhowice border crossing with Poland will be temporarily closed for several months.

Title: Air defense forces shoot down 67 attack UAVs, one guided missile ...
Description: On the night of September 30, 2024 (from 19:00 on September 29 to 08:00 on September 30), the enemy struck Ukraine with missiles of various types and attack UAVs. In total, the radio technical troops of the Air Force detected and escorted 76 enemy air attack vehicles, the AFU reported on Monday morning.

Title: Poroshenko at security conference in Sweden: West has means to de...
Description: The leader of the European Solidarity party, MP Petro Poroshenko, participating in the international security conference in Visby (Sweden), called on Western allies to ensure Ukraine's victory, and stressed that the West has all the capabilities and resources to ensure that Russia is defeated in Ukraine.

Title: NATO Military Committee Chairman Bauer: Putin's latest statements...
Description: NATO Military Committee Chairman, Admiral Rob Bauer believes that Vladimir Putin's latest statements about revising the nuclear deterrence doctrine, in which he intimidates countries supporting Ukraine, are caused by the failure to achieve the strategic goals of the war he started against Ukraine.

Title: Rada European Integration Committee head on Zelenskyy's visit to ...
Description: Head of the Verkhovna Rada Committee on Ukraine's Integration into the European Union Ivanna Klympush-Tsintsadze (European Solidarity faction) named the pros and cons of the visit of Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy to the United States.

Title: Ukrainian MFA comments on IFRC decision regarding RRC
Description: The Ukrainian Ministry of Foreign Affairs is disappointed with the decision of the board of the International Federation of Red Cross and Red Crescent Societies (IFRC) regarding the Russian Red Cross (RRC).

Title: USA carefully studying President Zelenskyy's Plan for Victory – B...
Description: U.S. Secretary of State Antony Blinken said that the U.S. administration is studying the 'Plan for Victory' that Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy presented to U.S. President Joe Biden during their meeting at the White House in Washington, Voice of America said.

Title: One killed, three wounded by enemy drone in Kozacha Lopan in Khar...
Description: On Saturday, at about 13:00, the Russian armed forces struck Kazacha Lopan, Head of Kharkiv regional military administration Oleh Stnehubov said.

Title: NATO's Military Committee chairman: NATO's new assistance center ...
Description: NATO's Military Committee Chairman, Admiral Rob Bauer announced that the new NATO Security Assistance and Training for Ukraine (NSATU) will start operating at the end of this year.

Title: Lithuania transfers new batch of military aid to Ukraine
Description: Lithuania has announced the transfer of a new batch of military aid to Ukraine, including, in particular, logistical equipment and ammunition.

Title: NATO Military Committee Chairman Bauer: Russia's possible attack ...
Description: NATO Military Committee Chairman, Admiral Rob Bauer says Russia's political ambitions are greater than conquering Ukraine, but they must be backed up by the corresponding capabilities to attack the alliance's member countries, for which the Kremlin will need time.

Title: War criminal, colonel of Russian armed forces Alexey Kolomeytsev ...
Description: On the night of September 27, a colonel from Russia, a war criminal, the head of the 924th state center for unmanned aviation of the Russian Defense Ministry Alexey Vladimirovich Kolomeytsev was liquidated in Moscow egion.

Title: NATO Military Committee Chairman Bauer: Ukrainian operation in Ku...
Description: Chairman of the NATO Military Committee, Admiral Rob Bauer believes that the Ukrainian military operation in Kursk region of Russia created a strategic problem for Putin.

Title: The Chairman of the NATO Military Committee, Admiral Rob Bauer: K...
Description: An exclusive interview with the Interfax-Ukraine agency of the Chairman of the NATO Military Committee, Admiral Rob Bauer, in which he assesses the situation on the battlefield, speaks of the same problems facing both Ukraine and Russia, the solution of which will be depend on the further development of the situation.

Title: Defense Forces target six Russian forces' concentration areas in ...
Description: Over the past 24 hours, aviation, missile troops and artillery of the Defense Forces hit six areas of concentration of enemy personnel, weapons and military equipment, destroyed two command posts, and also hit two artillery systems, the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine (AFU) said in a summary as of 08:00 on Saturday in Telegram channel.

Title: Last night, Air Force shoots down 69 attack UAVs, two guided miss...
Description: Last night, Air Force units shot down two of the four missiles that attacked Ukraine and 69 of the 73 attack UAVs, the press service of the Air Force of the Armed Forces of Ukraine (AFU) said.
